rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious, open area with Bohemian decor. Accessible entrance for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with Vastu-compliant south-east positioning. Wheelchair accessible layout.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for convenience. Bohemian design elements and ample natural lighting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with Bohemian accents, Vastu-compliant north direction. Accessible closet space.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed with Bohemian elements. Wheelchair accessible doorways and storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with Bohemian decor. Vastu principles ensure a harmonious environment.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with abundant natural light and accessibility features. Designed to foster creativity.

rooms.name: Ground Floor Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible bathroom featuring grab bars and slip-resistant surfaces.

rooms.name: Storage Closet
rooms.description: Dedicated storage space on the ground floor for easy access.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible entry with a gentle ramp and Vastu-friendly positioning.

openings.name: Living Room Window
openings.description: Large window to ensure ample natural light in the living area.

openings.name: Kitchen Window
openings.description: Strategically placed for optimal cross-ventilation and Vastu compliance.
